description: elaborate, with three-dimensional back plate; cartouche-form back plate is embossed, chased and applied with Rococo-style scrolls, flowers, lions, flanking a raised crown; raised arcade surmounted by eagle; posts are fronted by eight oil receptacles set on eagles' backs within fruit-swag galleried borders, all on a pierced base with grapevine supported and tassel enrichments
title: Hanukkah lamp
